item.title: About
item.description:
Hey, I’m Deepankar - a software engineer based in Bangalore. I build backends and infrastructure for AI systems, mainly in Python and Go.

Currently at GoodNotes. Previously a founding engineer at Jina AI (acquired by Elastic), and built high-scale backends and data pipelines at Adobe Systems.

I spend time on open source:

  • jina-serve
  • langchain-serve
  • pyleak
  • godantic

Father of twin toddler boys - I’m always sleep deprived.

I’ve wanted to write for years but words never came easy. LLMs changed that - so here we are.
